post:
# Spry Servers Stimmy Special – Discounts & Deposit Matching

> Spring has almost sprung and we haven’t had a sale in a while.
> 
> Did you just get your stimmy check and can’t decide on where to spend it? Obviously, you should spend it on a shiny new VPS or dedicated server with us!
> 
> In addition to the sale below, we are offering to match 25% of your account credit deposits up to $1400! (see what we did there?)
> 
>  Now, let’s get to the sale:
> 
> **40% off any [VPS](https://www.spryservers.net/vps "VPS") (recurring)**
> Promo Code: STIMMYVPS21
> Valid Thru: 03/26/2021
> 
> **25% off [Phoenix Dedicated Servers](https://www.spryservers.net/dedicated "Phoenix Dedicated Servers") (recurring)**
> Promo Code: STIMMYDEDI21
> Valid Thru: 03/26/2021
> 
> **20% off [Instant Dedicated Servers](https://sprsrv.cc/instantdedi-phx "Instant Dedicated Servers") (recurring)**
> Promo Code: STIMMYINSDEDI21
> Valid Thru: 03/26/2021
__________________________________

**Credit Matching Terms & Conditions:**
_Any deposit you make to your Spry Servers credit balance will be matched at a rate of 25% of the deposit. We will match up to 25% of a total of $1400. You must open a support ticket after depositing credit and mention this offer to receive bonus deposit. Deposits are non-refundable and do not expire. This offer is valid through 03/31/21._

**Discount Promo Terms & Conditions:**
_Offer will be deemed invalid if you cancel any similar existing configuration within 45 days of this offer._
